summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue West from West Garfield Street to West Howe Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein, together with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2381 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
